item.title: Pickup command help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup")) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command help
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

That conditional is a bit messed up. It’s saying that if the command equals “pickup”, then if the playerName equals “Mod luke”, then process the command. However, if the player name does not equal “Mod luke”, then if the playerRights is greater than or equal to 0, process the command.

Basically there is no point in checking rights as you have already limited the command to work only for yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

i am trying to make pickup for everyone so i changed the player rights to 0 and compiled with no errors. i tryed to pickup as a normal player but nothing is working. if i try with owner it works.

this is my command:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod luke") || playerRights >= 0)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }

any1 help please.

i would be greatfull
